description: Failed client details with failed reason
title: ClarityAuthStats

uri.description: The URI of the configuration entity

portName.description: port name on which client connects

vlan.description: Assigned VLAN for the client after authentication

start_timestamp.description: Starting time stmp value for the authentication

stop_timestamp.description: Ending time stmp value for the authentication

fail_reason.description: If authentication is failed then the reason of the failure

server_retry_count.description: Number of times switch tries for RADIUS authentication

client_retry_count.description: Number of times client is retried for authentication

server_ip.description: IP address of the RADIUS server

server_elapsed_time.description: Total time taken by the RADIUS server for authentication

client_elapsed_time.description: Total time taken by the client for the authentication

is_tunnel_client.description: if client traffic will be tunneled or not

tunnel_elapsed_time.description: Time taken for establishing the tunnel
